feedback.description: Thank you for using Quran.com and we would be glad to hear your feedback on <link>feedback.quran.com</link>
feedback.title: We wanna hear your thoughts

quran-foundation-link.description: Use your Quran.com login for access to QuranReflect.com â€” a thriving global community engaged in Quranic reflection.
quran-foundation-link.title: Use your account across Quran.Foundation apps!

quran-growth-journey.description: Maintain your Quran reading streak and progress through your goals while building new habits
quran-growth-journey.title: Start your Quran Growth Journey!

slide-1.description:
We are very happy to announce that now you can group bookmarks under "collections"!

  • Add as many collections as you want
  • Add a bookmark to one or more collections
  • And more!
slide-1.title: Bookmarks collections are here!

audio.exp-tip:
Change the content displayed under

Settings > Word By Word
audio.exp-tip-no-select:
Tick the tooltip display option and select the

Translation and/or Transliteration option

under Settings > Word By Word, to

enable this feature.

player.mismatch: Click on "Start Over" if you would like to play {{currentReadingChapter}} instead

audio.repeat-moved: The repeat settings have moved to the audio player. Click on the <0></0> icon to access them
audio.title: Audio

command-bar.placeholder: What do you want to read?

community.header: Join the QDC Community of Muslim builders and technologists.
community.sub-header: Sign up for the Quran.com Discord to participate and collaborate with the leading community building Islamic tech.
community.title: Community

communication.body:
ðŸš€ Supercharge your progress through personalized notifications about your goal progress, maintaining streaks, and enhancing your usage of our current features.



Can we keep you in the loop through email and other channels? You're in control â€“ feel free to adjust these preferences anytime in your account settings.



Simply select 'Allow' for inspiring reminders or 'Not Now' to decline.

default-description: The Quran translated into many languages in a simple and easy interface

email-verification.check-spam: Didn't receive the verification email? Check your spam inbox
email-verification.email-sent: We just sent an email to {{email}}

error.email-login-fail: Failed to login with email. Please try again
error.general: Something went wrong. Please try again.
error.offline: Looks like you lost your connection. Please check it and try again.
error.pref-persist-fail: Failed to sync your settings to the cloud.

fonts.qcf-desc: King Fahad Complex (V1 and V2) Fonts provide higher quality but take longer to load.
fonts.tajweed-desc: Tajweed font shows a Tajweed colored Mushaf. You can read more about the Tajweed color rules <0> here </0>

footer.description: Quran.com is a Sadaqah Jariyah. We hope to make it easy for everyone to read, study, and learn The Noble Quran. The Noble Quran has many names including Al-Quran Al-Kareem, Al-Ketab, Al-Furqan, Al-Maw'itha, Al-Thikr, and Al-Noor.
footer.hiring: We're hiring! Join the QuranFoundation team and contribute to our mission. <link>Apply now!</link>
footer.title: Read, study, and learn The Noble Quran.

fundraising.description: Don't miss the opportunity to gain multiplied rewards these last blessed nights of Ramadan. Even small monthly donations make an impact!
fundraising.title: Become A Monthly Donor

pbuh: Blessings of Allah be upon him

popup.footnote: Monthly donations allow us to focus less on fundraising
popup.text-1: We are committed to serving the world Quranic knowledge and technology, always for free.
popup.text-2: The perfect opportunity for continuous charity (Sadaqah Jariyah). Please consider investing in your Hereafter as a monthly (or one-time) donor.
popup.title: Dear Companion of the Quran,

reciter-summary: Word by word reciter: {{reciterName}}. Click on a word to listen to its recitation.

search.no-results-suggestion: We could not find any matching search results for "{{searchQuery}}". try searching for a different keyword.
search.title: Search

settings.reset-notif: Your settings have been reset to the default ones
settings.title: Settings
settings.tooltip-playing-audio-helper: Show word translation in tooltip while playing ayah
settings.wbw-helper: Display the translation or transliteration directly under the word
settings.word-tooltip-helper: Display the translation or transliteration when hovering or clicking the word

shared: Link has been copied to the clipboard!

tafsir.group-message: You are reading a tafsir for the group of verses {{from}} to {{to}}

tafsir.tafsirs-desc: Read various Tafsirs of Ayah {{ayahNumber}} of Surah {{surahName}} by trusted Tafsir scholars
tafsir.title: Tafsir

themes.system-desc: The system theme automatically adopts to your light/dark mode settings

voice.suggest-subtitle: Recite any verse in Arabic, and the verse will appear
